MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Llanbedrog, affecting properties in Glanymor and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:50PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25PM on 16th April 2021.
